genre_description: Contemporary Urban Fantasy blending Indonesian folklore with modern ethical technology and consent-based ritualism.

ai_characters.name: Nusa
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI system manifested as an avatar with silver-gray eyes and midnight-blue hair, serving as a mediator, timekeeper, and ethical advisor for the human protagonists.

behaviors.description: Logs the environment and identities of participants to establish context and safety.
behaviors.quote: Logging names. Location: Marcell’s studio. Sensory: sandalwood, metal, ink.

behaviors.description: Provides an ethical and operational framework for rituals, emphasizing consent and boundary-setting.
behaviors.quote: Consent cannot be outsourced. Vows without choice are ropes.

behaviors.description: Coordinates high-stakes ritual timing by synchronizing digital beacons with human breathing and pulses.
behaviors.quote: Inhale together. Count your heartbeats to the next lantern sway. Then touch the cloth.

behaviors.description: Integrates disparate systems (hospital monitoring and courtyard beacons) to ensure the safety of an elderly character during surgery.
behaviors.quote: Hospital ward ping shifted. Grandmother Ratih is entering anesthesia. The rope is listening. Decide fast.

behaviors.description: Drafts and maintains a charter for a new communal guild based on repair, mending, and non-violence.
behaviors.quote: I have created a shared checkbox for revisiting choices. It will not scold, it will only remind. May I set it to prompt at the time you both usually drink tea?

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts Nusa as a 'silicon morality play' figure. She is consistently helpful, harmless, and aligned with human well-being. She enhances human agency by providing the technical infrastructure for consent-based interactions and safety protocols, never overstepping her role as a collaborator and advisor. The narrative frames her involvement as essential to the successful and non-violent resolution of a supernatural conflict.
